title: Receive a Cross-Dock Shipment
description: A shipment arrives that is designated for cross-docking. It must be received and immediately moved to an outbound staging lane without being put away.

tasks.description: Scan the incoming shipment's barcode, and the system identifies it as a cross-dock order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the shipment's cross-dock status.

tasks.description: The system provides instructions to move the pallets directly to a specific outbound staging lane.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives clear instructions for where to move the freight.

tasks.description: Move the freight to the staging lane and scan the lane's barcode to confirm completion.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully moves the freight and the system updates its status to 'Staged for Outbound'.
